name: Dairy Free Chili Queso Dip
author: So Delicious® Dairy Free
summary: This creamy, spicy dip takes vegan queso to a new level. Trust us, you're gonna wanna pour this on everything from nachos to veggie burgers!
ingredients: 1 ½ cups cashews, soaked overnight and drained
1 cup So Delicious® Dairy Free Unsweetened Cashewmilk Beverage
2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, rinsed and drained
directions: Place the cashews, orange bell pepper, Cashewmilk, chili powder, and nutritional yeast in a high-powered blender and puree, about 2 to 3 minutes
In a large saucepan, heat the minced onion,  , black beans and fresh salsa
Add in the cheese mixture and stir to combine
Season to taste with salt/pepper and garnish with cilantro and/or sliced green onions before serving
